description:
Get The Song: http://pmjlive.com/where-or-when | World Tour Tix: http://pmjtour.com 
For the past seven years, Sunny Holiday has worked beyond the scenes as a creative with PMJ, contributing all things visual on our videos and tours — everything from wardrobe to choreography to overall stage direction, set design, and even cover art. If you've ever watched a PMJ video and thought, "Wow! That looks amazing!" -- that's Sunny's doing. She is truly an “old soul” — and she also happens to be a truly fantastic vocalist! Here she is taking center stage on our version of the beautiful 1937 Rodgers & Hart classic recorded by Ella Fitzgerald, Frank Sinatra and many others, “Where or When.”

Follow Sunny Holiday: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/misssunnyholiday/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/misssunnyholiday/

See Postmodern Jukebox LIVE! Tickets On Sale NOW for the US/Canada, UK, Europe, Australia/NZ, Asia — find over 100 dates on sale here: http://pmjtopur.com

Follow Postmodern Juk
title: Where or When - Postmodern Jukebox feat. Sunny Holiday
